page.title: 05Local Businesses
page.content: Thorpes' garage has 60 lorry-tractors 400 trailers, 4 coaches and 8 cranes. They will carry anything, but mainly carry steel for British Steel.Down at Thorpes in the first shed a man put a car on a ramp which was powered by hydrailic rams.Then we went into the lettering shed and there was a truck being done up.The lettering was in gold leaf.A man showed us how to make a box out of metal. LASER stands for light amplication stimulation emission radiation.Lasers are used for setting a strip of pipe.The laser factory is in an old shed.The were not very powerful but they can go 1km.Bramall lasers employ 8 men and Thorpes employ 70 men.
